title: Sunday Worship Service
description: Join us for our weekly Sunday worship service featuring inspiring messages, uplifting music, and fellowship. All are welcome to experience God's presence with us.

title: Youth Conference 2024
description: A transformative three-day conference for young people aged 13-25. Experience powerful worship, engaging workshops, and connect with peers in faith. Topics include identity, purpose, and spiritual growth.

title: Community Outreach - Food Drive
description: Join us in serving our community by distributing food packages to families in need. Volunteers needed for sorting, packing, and distribution. Make a difference in someone's life today.

title: Wednesday Bible Study
description: Dive deeper into God's Word with our weekly Bible study. This month we're exploring the Book of Romans. Bring your Bible, notebook, and an open heart to learn and grow together.

title: Women's Prayer Breakfast
description: Ladies, join us for a morning of prayer, fellowship, and encouragement. Enjoy a delicious breakfast while connecting with other women of faith. Guest speaker: Pastor Sarah Johnson.

title: Children's Ministry Kickoff
description: Exciting new semester for our children's ministry! Fun activities, Bible stories, crafts, and games for ages 4-12. Parents welcome to stay for the first session.

title: Marriage Enrichment Seminar
description: Strengthen your marriage with practical tools and biblical principles. Topics include communication, conflict resolution, and keeping romance alive. For married couples and engaged couples preparing for marriage.

title: Men's Fellowship Breakfast
description: Men, join us for food, fellowship, and faith-building discussion. This month's topic: 'Leading with Integrity in the Workplace.' Bring a friend!

title: Worship Night - An Evening of Praise
description: Join us for a special evening dedicated to worship and praise. Experience the presence of God through powerful music, prayer, and testimonies. Bring your family and friends.

title: New Members Class
description: Interested in becoming a member of Grace Fellowship Church? Join us for this informative class covering our beliefs, mission, and how to get involved. Light refreshments provided.

title: Community Health Fair
description: Free health screenings, wellness information, and resources for the community. Services include blood pressure checks, diabetes screening, nutrition counseling, and more. Open to all.

title: Youth Game Night
description: Teens, join us for an epic game night! Board games, video games, pizza, and prizes. Invite your friends for a fun evening of fellowship and friendly competition.

title: Financial Freedom Workshop
description: Learn biblical principles for managing money, getting out of debt, and building wealth. Topics include budgeting, saving, investing, and generous giving. Workbook provided.

title: Senior Saints Luncheon
description: Seniors (55+), join us for a delicious lunch, inspiring message, and wonderful fellowship. Special musical performance by the Grace Singers. Transportation available upon request.

title: Easter Cantata Rehearsal
description: Choir members and anyone interested in participating in our Easter cantata, join us for rehearsal. All voice parts needed. Music will be provided. No audition required.
